website_summaries.verdict: Not a bad pick if you prefer a mild formula with a light scent, but if you need an oatmeal formula that also tackles pet odor, you may want to check other brands on our shortlist.
pros: Features natural ingredients in a mild formula that's gentle to use on puppies and cats
Some users noted that it soothes allergy-prone skin and conditions fur
cons: While some consumers liked its mild scent, others commented that it did little to combat strong odors or help dogs with strong "doggy" smells

customer_reviews.title: Great for German Shepherds
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best dog shampoo I have ever used! I have a German Shepherd and, needless to say, she gets stinky in just a few days. I have tried a lot of the expensive shampoos and nothing lasted -- not even the groomer shampoos. But this one does! Instead of having to endure her short-hair stinkiness after 2-3 days, this shampoo lasts two weeks! And it keeps her shedding and itching to an absolute minimum all while keeping her nice and shiny. This shampoo does everything!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought this shampoo would be crap, but it actually pulls tons of dirt off my dogs that other shampoos do not. My dogs fur feels soft and smells nice after using this. I have compared this to other mass market brands and I feel this shampoo does better at pulling dirt out of my dogs fur. The bottle is much smaller than what it appears to be in the picture, so pay attention to the ounces when ordering. I would like to get a little more shampoo per bottle, so that I do not have to reorder so quickly. I am continuing to purchase this shampoo from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: XV123

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff for dry skin/dandruff
customer_reviews.text: When I first brought my 5 month old 10 pound bistonterrier home I noticed little white specks all over him. I also noticed he was itching after owning him for a weak I was convinced he had fleas. Before I administered anything I wanted to rule out all possibilities so I gave him a bath with this shampoo confined combo, afterward I applied some coconut oil (beware oil stains things like couches) and the itching stopped! We have been using this shampoo/ conditioner once a month plus feeding him eggs in the morning to help with his coat/skin and no more itching or flakes. Be extra sure to rinse all shampoo and conditioner out SUPER important for dry skinned dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Winston’s mom

customer_reviews.title: It smells great and leaves my GSD's coat very soft and shinier ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this shampoo. It smells great and leaves my GSD's coat very soft and shinier than ever. She is an active dog and likes to swim and play in the mud, resulting in frequent baths. Other shampoos used to leave her coat coarse, dry, dull, visibly flaky/itchy, and she constantly scratched. I tried using the best conditioners after the baths and even my expensive leave-in conditioners for my color-treated hair as well. I now only use this shampoo with a warm water rinse and nothing else. Have even had compliments on her shiny coat from other dog owners. Now I just want to be able to buy a much bigger bottle at a time.
customer_reviews.author: coupon_diva40

customer_reviews.title: Great dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: We're already on our second bottle with our Cavalier! Although he'd rather smell like dirt and grass, we really appreciate the delicate scent it leaves on his coat. It also really helps detangle and adds shine. One thing I noticed with our last bottle - a lot of the oatmeal had deposited at the bottom of it. I wonder - should we shake the bottle before every bath?
customer_reviews.author: svgmo18

customer_reviews.title: Paws & Pals Natural Oatmeal Dog
customer_reviews.text: Does Wonders On The Softness And Shininess Of Their Coats!! I have a Miniature Pinscher and two German shepherds. So so soft after washing... and my min pins coat is fabulously shiny! There was no wet dog smell after... I honestly didn't think the shampoo smelled like anything... not good nor bad.. just neutral.. and thats how it was after I dried the dogs off. I would buy it again not because it made my dog smell great but because of how amazing their coat is after!! just wow!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jess

customer_reviews.title: Don't chance the health of your pet. Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo left my dog swollen all over. There are red bumps all over his skin. His face and tongue are swollen as well. It has also caused him to vomit because he was licking himself due to the itching. Like the other one star reviews, I will not order this again. Don't chance it, buy something that doesn't have all these chemicals in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ford

customer_reviews.title: NOT for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Schnoodle who has seasonal allergies in hopes it would help his itching. This stuff broke him out almost immediately, he had a terrible rash and hot spots on his belly and chest. Awful. This will be going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Centurion

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I am a caregiver for my mother who has 2 dogs and I have 1, they are Shi-tzu's. I take them every 6 wks to be groomed & they all have sensitive skin. I took this shampoo to leave with our groomer, picked them up not only were they not itching but wow the 2 that had white on them were the whitest I have ever seen them. Keep in mind one is 13 and the other that has white is 10. So hands down this is the very best dog shampoo I have purchased, I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand! Shampoo and Conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had dogs for as long as I can remember. When we got our Doodle this winter we quickly discovered a not so great thing about a dog that doesn’t shed.... he smelled. He also had irritated skin to the point where he pulled out his own fur on his chest. I decided to ditch my cheap Walmart dog shampoo and try something else! after reading lots of reviews I decided to give this one a shot and I do not regret that decision. Our pup smells clean for days and has stopped pulling out his fur. I’m sold!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan. Thrw it away
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of shampoos on my dog. I try to stay away from perfumes and such. But this one left her smelling like a wet do even after she dried. I had to rehash her. And no...it wasn’t because she was particularly more dirty that time. It just didn’t work well
customer_reviews.author: Christina Zampitella

customer_reviews.title: Slightly difficult to rinse off but smells great
customer_reviews.text: So ive never had a problem with rinsing before so I'm going to have to assume its this particular soap that is giving me issues. Twice now I've had to re rinse my dog after I found soap still on him while drying. Mostly his belly and back leg area (runoff and more difficult to reach area) so keep that in mind when you use this. Other than that i would say its great. It smells fantastic and I do believe monty is scratching less
customer_reviews.author: Hbugg96

customer_reviews.title: My dog allergic to this product.
customer_reviews.text: My dog was highly allergic to this product. She had problems breathing immediately after her bath and she scratched like crazy. We bathed her again in her regular shampoo to try and get this product off of her. She slowly got better but I stayed up with her most of the nigh. It wasn’t until the next day that she wasn’t scratching and her breathing back to normal. I threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: We have a large dog who has a ton of thick hair. After using the same product for the past five years, we finally made the decision to switch shampoos for her. I am glad we did! This shampoo smelled so good! My two year old helped bathe our dog and the shampoo was gently on her skin (which breaks out to everything). My dog seemed happy, smelled great, and looked very clean after bathing her in this shampoo. I have already recommended this to a couple of our family members and would definitely order it again!
customer_reviews.author: MattrKoetje

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have a golden retriever and usually have to use half a bottle of shampoo to get his entire body washed. This stuff I didn't need to do that, it lathers up nicely and a little bit goes a long way! I also loved the smell, sort of a cherry vanilla scent, almost like a cake. It wasn't too overpowering, so after his bath my dog didn't smell strongly of the stuff. I almost wish the scent was stronger & lasted longer, but that might irritate my dog, so I'm fine with it being subtle the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: C.Carter

customer_reviews.title: Smells Deliscious
customer_reviews.text: use this on my 4 year old Poodle mix. I leaves her feeling super soft and smelling good. It's almost exactly like one that my vet tried to sell me. It's smells the same and is soap free so you can bath your dog more often and it wont dry their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Be Your Devine Self :-)

customer_reviews.title: Best dog shampoo I ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is great , turns my pupps furr into silky , soft and makes her smell amazing! I've used this brand over 5 years after trying many different brands. After giving my pupp a bath she feels better from being nice and clean, actually loves taking a bath as well all I have to say is bath time and she heads straight to my bathroom then climbs into the bathtub. She's A very obedient dog but it's obvious she loves getting cleaned ever since starting to use this product. Very Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this shampoo based on the great reviews! It's smells great and lathers up well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this shampoo based on the great reviews! It's smells great and lathers up well! However the ingredients listed isn't all that is in here, kind of misleading! I've included the full list of ingredients! Hope it helps everyone else!
customer_reviews.author: Vannie.p

customer_reviews.title: Good for frequent use
customer_reviews.text: We live out in the country, so our dogs often need "destinkifying." Normally I'd get something that removes odor, but when you have to bathe them this often, you want something really gentle and that improves itchiness. This fits the bill. It doesn't lather very well (although I know that lather=/= clean, it still doesn't necessarily FEEL like it's working as well) but it doesn't irritate their skin, and it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All natural IMMEDIATELY killed fleas upon contact
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this shampoo for my new puppy skin issues. Last night while bathing the dogs. I saw 2 fleas which were already dead from the ingredients. We live in Florida and just came back from a walk. Because he never gets fleas. So on top of being all natural, it also kills fleas and I really like that. I DO my best to make sure everything that goes in or on their bodies are not harmful. I want them around as long as possible. Highly recommended!! Leaves their skin and fur very soft. Thank you!! Love, Kylo and Stella's Mom🐶💙🐶💜
customer_reviews.author: LAINY

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best dog shampoo that I've used
customer_reviews.text: My girl is a very active lab and she needs weekly baths. It's important to me to find the right balance between a product that moisturizes and one that gets her really clean. This hits the mark. She smells amazing and her fur is fluffy and soft. She's been shedding less as well, which makes me a happy dog mom. If you need a shampoo that cleans well, and leaves your fur baby moisturized (especially this winter), this is what you need. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno!
customer_reviews.text: It's not a good shampoo!! It's really slippery if that makes sense. It slides down your hands and goes down the drain. Hard to stay on fur/hand. I just didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gentle Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I currently have five dogs, ranging from 2lbs to 12 lbs. Being so small they can be very sensitive especially my one dog, Vivi. She is prone to seizures when exposed to various things. I did a full crew bath night tonight and I was very happy with this shampoo. It lathers really well without having to use a ton and smells nice but not crazy strong. It was easy to rinse and the dogs are all super soft now. I am very happy with this shampoo and do plan to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pandascandles

customer_reviews.title: Best dog shampoo EVER! Well it use to be...
customer_reviews.text: Update: They changed something about this shampoo and now it doesn’t work as well. I bathed my dogs a few days ago and am three of them are flaky and shedding like crazy. 👎🏻 I’ve tried several different shampoos and none of them helped my dog. But then I tried this and she doesn’t itch. She also has really coarse hair and it made me itch. But this stuff makes her SO soft and now I can cuddle her with out itching myself.
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. A little goes. long way, the lather is rich, and easily rinses clean. I'm not sure about the smell, it's described as baby powder, but, it's not. I'd rather have scentless, than the current scent which is not great. I will continue to use because it's a good product. I use a stay in conditioner and that takes care of the unpleasant scent (which is mild.)
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Where has this dog shampoo been all my dogs life
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best dog shampoo I have ever used! I have tried so many brands across the board from expensive name brand shampoos to handmade ones from Etsy. This shampoo smells amazing and makes my dogs itchy dull fur look and feel amazing! I have a Boston Terrier mix with skin issues and this shampoo seems to calm her itchy skin. Also it smells so good I want to try it out!!! So incredibly happy with this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Heather03lynn

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo made patches of my dog's hair fall out ...
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo made patches of my dog's hair fall out. I have a mini pin with a black coat.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: I love the all in one
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bottle and my 2 dogs hate getting a bath. I always use oatmeal in the winter since it seems to help with the dryness on their skin. I gave them a bath and it seems like they aren't scratching and love the fact that the conditioner is in with the shampoo since this way bath time is cut in 1/2. Thanks for a so far so good dog shampoo with conditioner all in one.
customer_reviews.author: SPN

customer_reviews.title: works and smells great
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is awesome. I use it once a week on my french bulldogs and it takes the smell right off of them. This shampoo leaves their fur feeling soft and the smell is very mild and pleasant. I would expect this shampoo to cost a lot more than it does and for the quality of the shampoo at the cost this is unbeatable. Its also good to have a healthier alternative than the run of the mill chemical heavy shampoos others are selling.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon SpencerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!! 1st use and seems my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Everything right now seems great. It’s defiantly a lot better on my dogs skin than what I’ve gotten from Walmart. LOL! I have a Pitbull, so her skin is super sensitive. So I literally used this once and I can tell she is a lot more comfortable than when i used Walmart brands. Well not really, Walmart brands but I would use Oscars and Burt’s Bees. I enjoy how I can use a quarter sized amount of this product and it lathers her whole body. Seems possible that the bottle may last longer than a good month or so. Wish us luck on ridding itches and such :)
customer_reviews.author: iBillboBaggs

customer_reviews.title: Constantly changing! Less value now!
customer_reviews.text: I wish Paws N Pals would quit changing the bottle and now the formula! I use a bottle about every 3 months for my lab/golden retriever mix, it has worked well for years. Now, however, the bottle has been changed to a pump style and it’s watered down, which doesn’t work near as well on her thick coat. Also, the bottles both state that they contain 20 oz. That can’t be true because I emptied the new bottle into an old one and it didn’t even fill it to the 3/4 mark. Go back to the old non-pump style, Paws N Pals!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STUFF. Affordable and amazing better than what they have in store shelves. Recently rehomed a mini schnauzer, was using baby shampoo for the mean time and her fur wouldn’t look/feel the greatest, she enjoys being outside and is trained to potty outside however, she would get really itchy due to allergens from the grass. Schnauzers are known to be hypoallergenic. LET ME TELL YOU SUM WHEN I FIRST PUT THIS ON HER she felt so much better itching and scratching is minimal to none, her fur feels AMAZING and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Edna R.

customer_reviews.title: long hair dog
customer_reviews.text: i have a puppy that likes to eat dirt...and he is white in color. I am constantly having to wash his face and feet and this soap has a light sent and does not sud up. Puppy does not seem to mind the soap and it does the job. arrived as promised and description is accurate. i would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LBG333

customer_reviews.title: Reduces dandruff and odor
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different kinds of shampoo for my dog with dandruff but none of them seemed to work very well. I tried castile soap and it worked better than the other dog shampoos but this shampoo works very well. It lathers and coats her fur so easily and feels moisturizing even when I'm washing her. The scent isn't overwhelming and her dandruff has reduced by half already. It also keeps her less smelly in between washes. I will definitely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!  Finally one that does what it says! New Holy Grail!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried a lot for dog's sensitive skin but she still itched after bath. NOT with this!! It really seemed to clean her well, has pleasant smell, and she was HAPPY after bath. No dry skin, itching, or chewing that she still had after other oatmeal and the like products. GREAT STUFF!! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tree Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have Biewer Yorkies and always try to focus on their hair since they get itchy and dry with most products. This product works really well and does not seem to make their skin dry or flaky. Will definitely reorder. I also used the conditioner since they get really tangled and it’s hard to brush them out only with shampoo but short haired dogs should be fine
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Will buy again when I run out.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans very very very well. Doesn't foam much, but don't worry it's working! Rinses quite well. Smells REALLY good like cream, vanilla and Oats. Great for sensitive dogs. Leaves coat fairly soft. Removes oil, but doesn't dehydrate dog's skin or hair or hair follicles.
customer_reviews.author: TyFranc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dog shampoo. My medium haired corgi does really well with this stuff. Coat is soft and shiny after, no strong perfumes, and doesn't require a ton of product to lather up compared to some other shampoos I've tried like Mane 'n Tail.
customer_reviews.author: P Dub

customer_reviews.title: Unable to rinse. Caused rash!!
customer_reviews.text: In all the years I’ve been bathing my dogs, I have never had so much trouble rinsing the soap suds from their fur. Residual soap caused rashes and constant itching. Terrible product. Feels synthetic. Nothing like oatmeal should feel like.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and thought I was getting a good shampoo. i DID NOT. I used it on my two dogs. One had a rash, chewed her paw raw, and stopped eating. A vet appt was needed. She has a BAD reaction to this shampoo, so be careful. Poor thing had to get 3 pills to counter act the damage.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: nice shampoo that lasts
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and it said the scent would stay and not go away. Those reviews were correct. We try and wash our dog once a week, and when it is bath time, she still has a fresh clean smell, like she had when she had just been bathed. This shampoo seems to not affect our dogs skins as well. I have noticed when drying and brushing after a bath, my dogs coat seems a bit shinier and fluffier
customer_reviews.author: dogpile

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: My dog scratches a lot after using this shampoo. I thoroughly rinsed her but she still scratches. Too late to return as the return window closed but I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best i have ever used
customer_reviews.text: i have had dogs for pets my entire life and always look for the best products for them. not the most expensive but the best product and i have found it with this shampoo. it left his hair very soft and smelling great. plus it was very gentle on his skin. suds up great and most important thing is my little Buddy loved it. he is an 8 year old American Beagle with sensitive skin and this was the best shampoo we have ever used. will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This has been the worst product I have ever tried on my dog. She has sensitive skin and can scratch for a week to ten days after a bath. I tried this in hopes that it would help. I used it two weeks ago and even with meds she is still scratching. Contacted the company and no help. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't have sensitive skin, so I didn't buy it for that. His coat was soft, however he got so dirty when out for a walk. My dog is white and his paws were really black when we returned from a walk. The dirt went up his legs. The oils must attract dirt. The scent was OK, but didn't last. I went back to my ols shampoo, crazy dog.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Smells great Product arrived next day! But like you see in the pictures the bottle wasn’t padded well and the cap came loose during shipping. There wasn’t too much that leaked out so I didn’t bother sending it back. I just washed off the bottle. It smells good and makes my pup smell nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Dfly3770

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog/cat shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo on my two older Shih Tzu’s for the past year. They both deal with grass and weed allergies. This shampoo is so mild and gentle but does a good job of relieving their itchy paws, legs and body. Being soap free I’m able to wash their little head and face safely! There coats are so soft and smell good afterwards! It’s an amazing product and I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Marie

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best shampoo I've tried yet!! My yorkie is very itchy and sensitive. I've been using yorkie shine which is more expensive and never seemed to make her coat as soft and shiny as the groomer. I'm so impressed with this. No itching at all. Hair is soft and Shiney. She is 9 yrs old so have been trying different products for a while. Definitely will be buying this from now on. The scent is not strong at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Kopchu

customer_reviews.title: this is best shampoo i ever tried
customer_reviews.text: this is best shampoo i ever tried.. smells great, light and not overpowering. i was using low proced shampoos before.. like $5 bottles. i thoughtthat was enough. we have two dogs so we go thru quickly.. anyway, they always had rough, dry fur.. i never thought twice. i ordered this stuff caus someone told me that i should start using a better quality product and ithis seemed like something to try. WOW! fur the furst time ever, my dogs have soft, shiny, HEALTHY fur. Wont ever use bargain shampoo for dogs again....
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo but does not help for itchy skin
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it want to help to relieve the itchy skin for my dog. However it doesn't help. On the other hand, it's a good shampoo, a lot of foam to help to wash to my dog, also it makes the hair feel smooth and light scent. In conclusion it's good shampoo for bath but not for itchy skin relieve.
customer_reviews.author: dnschan

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: We rescued Miss Ellie from the pound recently. She came in as a stray and was filthy beyond belief. We had tried several other products to get her clean and yes they helped but nothing was getting rid of the smell she had. I ordered this to try and was simply amazed at not only how clean it got her and how much better she smells but her coat is sooooo soft now! Will definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever using this product on my dogs. My dogs seemed to be always itchy after returning from the Groomer...even when I would bath them at home. Since washing them using this soap, they don't seem to be itchy at all. They look very clean and smell good too!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Worked on Shih Tzu. Hives and dry flaky skin on Bichon Frise.
customer_reviews.text: So it's been about 2 weeks since I've purchased this shampoo for my two dogs. I have a 4-yo Shih Tzu and a 3-yo Bichon Frise. I shower my dogs every week or week and a half. My Shih Tzu is fine with the shampoo, no allergic rxn. However, my Bichon Frise broke out in hives and her skin is very dry and flaky. So maybe it's depends on the breed... I'll probably still use the shampoo on my Shih Tzu and try something new for my Bichon.
customer_reviews.author: Elainie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smell!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could find a shampoo for people that smells this good. Sometimes I go to the linen closet just to smell it. Our puppy seems to be fine with this shampoo and her coat is nice and soft afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this oatmeal dog shampoo numerous times from Amazon (LOVE IT! and also saw Paws and Pals at 2019 Super Zoo) and Amazon always shipped fast and came in individual sealed bags. Ordered 2 more and they arrived yesterday w/ no bags and 1 had opened w/ shampoo all over everything. :/ Not your fault but you may want to notify Amazon shipping. Thanks again for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: S Lola

customer_reviews.title: Good smell and good lather
customer_reviews.text: Having been a dog owner for a decade now, I have tried several types of shampoos and conditioners. This one is in my top five favorite of all time. The price is good, the smell is nice, and it lathers well. It also seems to be tear free which is important to me when I am bathing my 3 lb yorkie. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Doggie smells like a hippy
customer_reviews.text: She is clean, but she smells like sandalwood or patchouli. The shampoo doesn't work up much of a later either, fyi
customer_reviews.author: R. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: de-smells my hounds
customer_reviews.text: We are trying to trim the budget and visit the groomer less frequently. I have two hound dogs and they can get stinky, but they just need baths, not the full spa treatment. We struck out with human shampoo but this stuff is amazing. It really cleans their coats and keeps them smelling better for longer. We haven't noticed it bothering their skin, and one of my dogs is pretty sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pet Product
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with Amazon shipping but had nothing to do with the seller or the product itself. Someone at Amazon unscrewed the pump top so that during shipping it squirted shampoo all over the inside of the box. I am getting another bottle to replace it so will see if it comes with a big mess in the box this time. Other than that the product itself is fantastic, smells nice (not to strong) leaves the coat soft and supple. I have Bull Terriers and they enjoy their baths weekly. Very good product at a very good price point. I will be buying more in the near future. Highly recommended product for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Gives a silky smooth coat!
customer_reviews.text: I got my dog from the shelter, and when she came to me her skin was terrible. She had to wear a sweater, or she'd gnaw her own skin right off. I took her to the groomer on the first day, and have bathed her with this shampoo every week since. Her coat is shiny and soft (we thought she had wiry hair when we met her at the shelter bit it's actually very soft) and her skin is no longer flaky/itchy. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Webb

customer_reviews.title: Better than any dog shampoo I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: My dog was experiencing itching, and we still don't know the exact cause. However this shampoo did seem to calm him down and he instantly had a beautiful sheen and soft fur. It smells good and now his black fur is just so pretty! I mean, handsome! Unlike many dog shampoos, my hands didn't smell bad after washing him. And this is a big bottle. It will last a long time. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K ZanderTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Great scent! My dog smells so sweet after bathed with this Oatmeal shampoo. Also my dog has severe skin allergies and constantly suffered with itch skin. It seems like he is more calm and less scratching after using this shampoo. I will keep use it and see how his condition progresses.
customer_reviews.author: M. Y.

customer_reviews.title: I like it for my pup.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Shar-Pei and she is naturally a smelly dog. This shampoo leaves her smelling good and her coat shining. The older she gets the faster the scent goes away, and she’s back smelling like a “dog”. The shampoo would usually last a good 2 months, but now after turning age 1 she can be smelly again in 1 week. I would reccemmond, overall great shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Shiann

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and very skin soothing
customer_reviews.text: This is wayyyyy better than any other dog shampoo i’ve ever used. You can instantly feel and see the difference. Love the smell, not too overpowering but just perfect. It’s a thinner consistency and you really don’t need much since it lathers up really easily! Also I love the pump. When i’m out of this I will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Karen Muehlheim

customer_reviews.title: Watery Very watery
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this shampoo is scent! I received the bottle not like on the picture and it was so watery looks like if you mixed water and a little bit of shampoo together! What a shame I was so looking forward to use it!
customer_reviews.author: TheYfamily

customer_reviews.title: Ok but leaves a bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike the smell. It’s six hours since my Yorkie was bathed and she smells weird. The initial smell of the shampoo was ok. Not great but not awful. Now it’s awful. Her hair is soft. It lathered well. But I won’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo/Conditioner Combo for dry &/or itchy dogs
customer_reviews.text: My fue baby suffers from dermatitis. This shampoo/ conditioner combo leave coat soft & clean. Skin is clear. Also the scent is nice without being full of perfume. Made a postive difference in my Silky Terrier mix breed dog
customer_reviews.author: DisneyGurl

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my 2 short hair chihuahuas! Completely removes the doggy smell on their skin & now I don't need a conditioner, as it leaves them very soft! It saves me time as well, with only one step, which helps if you have more than one bath to give & you blow dry them like I do. Nice scent - almost a hint of sugar cookie, with that shea butter-ish smell.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is worth buying! And it smells amazing! I have a little yorkie that has thinner hair than most, and it's more like human hair. Usually we have to condition her after shampoo'ing, but not only did this help with her itching (she's allergic to something) her coat is soft and smooth and no extra conditioner was needed! And again like I said, she smells sooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B

customer_reviews.title: Great scent. Easy to rinse
customer_reviews.text: Overall good scent and easy to rinse. The only complaint is that is not the same formula as the old packaging, the new product is more watered down (not as thick). Im sure isn't gonna last as long, but will buy again
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Super happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: My dog has horrible allergies and is a senior. I suds her up once, rinsed. She ran all over acting like a puppy all day!!! I will Never go to a groomer again. This is so super good on her skin. She feels a thousand times better!!! Love this high standard product.
customer_reviews.author: Livinglavidaloca

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail dog shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Leaves my dog's coat incredibly shiny and soft. My dog is a pitbull mix with very sensitive skin. This relieves the flaking and itching without causing irritation or more dryness! I am now able to bathe her twice a month without drying out her skin-and she gets to play outside and get dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs get a quick bath once a week after going to the beach. This bottle is so easy to squirt on wiggling dogs. Soaps up just enough, rinses out quickly, and my dogs smell great all week long. Very pleased with Paws & Pals 5-In-1 Oatmeal Dog Shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: BriSon

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help with the itching.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this shampoo twice before returning. My small dog appeared to be more itchy after bathing. I can't be sure that the shampoo caused the additional itching but it certainly didn't seem to lessen the itching.
customer_reviews.author: TryingItOut

customer_reviews.title: Great pet wash, no more dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: This pet wash works great for dry skin. When we adopted our dog we noticed he had a lot of dry skin on his back. After using this and giving him flea treatment he doesn’t have dry skin or an itch. I love the smell of this stuff and when we wash him in the yard it doesn’t damage the grass!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and fluffy fur
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for bathing my floofie butt for 2 years now since he was 7 weeks old. This product smells great and makes his fur super super fluffy and soft and we get so many compliments. He has a bit of issue with dry skin but this gentle formula helps smoothe his skin and relieves some of the itch. I would highly recommend this and will continue to use this
customer_reviews.author: Koda

customer_reviews.title: Soft, silky dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this per shampoo for my two shorter-haired dogs. I bathed them today and am thrilled with the results. After they dried I brushed them well and all the downy undercoat fur just flew off of them. Their coats are now so incredibly soft, smooth and silky! They smell clean and fresh without being perfumed. I love this shampoo and will continue to use it regularly. Great results!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dubuisson

customer_reviews.title: Before the shampoo he had been suffering from flaky skin and dandruff was easy to see
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua has a skin condition so I always try to find something soothing for his skin. Before the shampoo he had been suffering from flaky skin and dandruff was easy to see. The shampoo really helped condition his son and barely don't see dandruff.
customer_reviews.author: Honeydew Cake

customer_reviews.title: Dogs were itchy after use
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo was okay. The fragrance was mild and the texture if the shampoo was not bad. Unfortunately, my dogs both itched after using this shampoo, so we had to discontinue its use.
customer_reviews.author: Linlin

customer_reviews.title: Bottle design was different
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is very good. It gives Very soft and shiny hair. However I was expecting gettin a brown bottle but it came clear ugly bottle. Bottle Design was one of my reason to pick this item but I got different so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Pup and suds
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite scent but great ingredients and wonderful reviews. I feel safe using this on our puppy. I got a leave in conditioner dog spray for detangling and to help the scent be a little nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Ok but scent isnt great
customer_reviews.text: The product does its job well, no arguments there. Mini poodle hair is soft and looks healthy. However I dont think the scent is good at all, doesnt smell fresh IMO. I'll use the bottle, but I dont plan on repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product I have a poodle
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have a poodle. I try and bathe him every two weeks. He hates bathes but he appears to tolerate this Pet Wash better than other shampoos. His coat is full and fluffy and easy to manage when I groom him too!
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Wilder

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is everything it claims to be. I have two Chihuahuas who love to roll in the grass at the dog park, well you can only imagine how they smell when we get home. This shampoo is gentle enough to use frequently and makes them so soft and smelling delicious. I absolutely love it and will never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: After trying the Earthbath shampoo and separate conditioner, we like the Oxgord best.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shampoo and the Earthbath Oatmeal and Aloe shampoo with Earthbath Oatmeal and Aloe conditioner. Washed our dog with Oxgord last weekend and Earthbath this weekend. The Earthbath seemed to strip her coat much more than the Oxgord, even with using the Earthbath conditioner. I think the Oxgard smells better as well. I was a bit hesitant of the Oxgord with the conflicting labeling/ingredients, but it leaves our dog clean, soft, and smelling good. Plus it's a shampoo and conditioner all in one, only 1 step vs 2. Excellent price as well. We like it and our dog doesn't mind it (no scratching or skin issues). It will be our go to shampoo/conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Tul9033

customer_reviews.title: Has eased irritation of my dogs skin and itching with one use
customer_reviews.text: My dog was scratching all the time. I tried this shampoo as soon as I got it. Still scratches at times but so much less and none at night. Redness on skin has disappeared. Coat nice and soft and she smells so clean. Will certainly continue use.
customer_reviews.author: S Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Makes your dogs fur so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It made my pup feel SO soft after one wash. After about three washes he was the softest he had ever been. It doesn't smell too strong but it is simply a pleasant smell. He didn't mind the smell to much either or else he would rub all over the beds and couches. I also like that it is pretty natural as far as the ingredients are concerned. I would buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: It does leave hair soft but not long lasting smell
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok.... the hype about this being the one shampoo that has a lasting smell....hm definitely not true. I have yet to find that long lasting shampoo that leaves my pup smelling like flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Gret
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my dogs with super sensitive skin. She has allergic reactions to pretty mu h everything and this was the only soap that didn't break her skin out in hives
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Griner

customer_reviews.title: Smells great all week long
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and keeps the itching minimal. I've noticed as I rinse my dog throughout the week (after using the shampoo for a biweekly bath) my dog will smell as good as bath night. I definitely rinse all the soap out during the initial wash and having the scent of this soap come back after just water rinses is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC SHAMPOO/CONDITIONER
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 schnauzers. I purchased this mainly because I'd been shampooing them about once a week. I was worried about their skin getting dry. I've only used it 2 times however so far I'm pleased with the results so far. It goes a long way just a little bit not like the other shampoos I've purchased. Guaranteed I'll be buying it again. I'm glad I found it on Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase. It smells good and the scent smells on the pup for at least two days. We loved the fact that it was super high quality for a great price. The shampoo is also dense so that we don't use too much, and the bottle will last us a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson W

customer_reviews.title: Clean and soft
customer_reviews.text: The part about softening a coarse coat is no joke! Our little princess is super soft now. She smells clean and isn’t scratching all the time. The shampoo comes out like a gel almost. Lathers nicely and rinses clean. It’s everything I wanted it to be.
customer_reviews.author: LOTR417

customer_reviews.title: shampoo that is great for dog with itchy skin
customer_reviews.text: omg i love this shampoo for my terrier mix puppy he has been so itchy with the change in season and i used this on him and it smelled so good and it made his hair coat so smooth and silky looking and it stopped his itchyness i love this product and so does my puppy thanks
customer_reviews.author: marina greck

customer_reviews.title: OK with fragrance. Prefer Dawn.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo works well enough and leaves a not-unpleasant fragrance on my dog. However, I’ve decided to use Dawn dishwashing liquid instead. Dawn is popular among people who show dogs and does an excellent job of cleaning and stripping oils from the dog’s fur while remaining gentle on his skin.
customer_reviews.author: MindKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo was pretty good. The one thing I have been impressed with is it’s affect on my dog’s itching. He hardly scratches at all anymore and his coat is super soft! I do wish the scent was a little stronger. I can’t really smell it on him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim for my fur babies, and they all absolutely love it! It definitely exceeded my expectations and we will continue to use this product! One of my doggos has very very sensitive skin and he breaks out using the simplest stuff but this oatmeal shampoo does the job and it does the job well! Thank you so much for the great product and we will continue to support your lovely business!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby West

customer_reviews.title: A Must for German Shepherds! 🐺
customer_reviews.text: We have a rescued German Shepherd. He was so dirty, his fur was really rough and coarse. Gave him 1 bath with this and he cleaned up really nice. And surprisingly enough his coat looks awesome and feels so much softer. I think he's sleeping better because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Geeky Couple

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and worth the try
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the lathering of this product and its performance as it stands against my dog who loves to get dirty. My pup tends to go from a natural white goat to tan and almost brown within a few days from his bath however this kept him clean for much longer than usual. I will be buying again and will surely recommend to my peers with pets.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my puppy after he had an allergic reaction that left his skin itchy and dry. Smells great, and definitely provided him with relief. Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

product_meta.title: Paws & Pals 5-In-1 Oatmeal Dog Shampoo, Conditions, Detangles, Moisturizes, Anti Itch, Odor Control - Made in USA w/Medicated Clinical Vet Formula - Best for Dog, Cat & Pets w/ Dry Itchy Skin | 20 oz
feature_bullets: THE MOST EFFECTIVE NATURAL PET SHAMPOO FOR YOUR LOYAL COMPANION: Our Pet Wash Shampoo is a premium coat and skin treatment that comes directly to you and your pet without sacrificing vegan and organic principles or quality. Our delicate balance of essential oils forms the foundation of a veterinarian recommended coat care regimen.

QUALITY SHAMPOO FOR YOUR DOG WITHOUT COMPROMISE: Your dog is a loving member of your family, does he or she not deserve the best when it comes to caring for their coat and skin. At Paws & Pals, we have developed a cleansing shampoo that not only respects the environment as well as nature but ensures that in doing so your pet has the best possible skin care and coat treatment available.

NOURISHING FORMULA: Our shampoo includes oatmeal, which will help moisturize and soothe itchy skin. It may also help relieve symptoms of allergies, hot spots, dry skin, and will also clean, deodorize, and soften your pet’s coat. Our pet wash cleaner also contains all natural ingredients such as aloe & ingredients which occur organically such as pro-vitamin B5. They assist in hydrating, healing and protecting your pet’s coat and skin.

TEAR-FREE SOAPLESS FORMULA TURNS BATHTIME INTO PLAYTIME: Our tear-free formula is the result of natural oils, vitamins, and extracts that do not irritate or inflame your dog's eyes or nose, ensuring that bath time is a fun and playful experience for you both. (we cannot guarantee a splash, free experience.)
MADE IN THE USA – Please note that sensitivities vary for each pet. Please monitor your dog for any adverse reactions caused by allergic or unexpected occurrences.
